falsificationAttempts.targetDescription: Idempotency could be overstated because request_version is fixed
falsificationQueries: check seed workflows for request_version usage
falsificationAttempts.falsificationAnalysis: The idempotency guarantee depends on the identity tuple and request_version. Seed workflows typically use request_version=1; if prompts evolve without bumping the version, the system will reuse existing requests. README should mention that changing prompt versions requires incrementing request_version.
